entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
